system.description:
You and your allies would be legendary if anyone knew who you actually were. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Allied creatures within the range of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} gain the benefits of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.m0l76nf5hlm54bck]{Combat Tactic}. If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qdmkvyr466mbvins]{Carver} and the allied creature does not have sneak attack, the bonus 1d6 or 2d6 damage applies as if it did, but it does not gain any sneak attack damage of its own.
  • Half your rogue levels count as Marshal levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qc8h2qnq0of52qct]{Rallying Surge} feature.
  • When you heal a creature with Rallying Surge, it becomes lightly obscured and has half cover until the end of its next turn.
